original_text: And the land that was desolate shall be tilled, instead of being the desolation that it was in the sight of all who passed by.
korean_text: 전에는 지나가는 자의 눈에 황폐하게 보이던 그 황폐한 땅이 장차 경작이 될지라

sentences.original_text: And the land that was desolate
instead of being the desolation that it was
in the sight of all who passed by
